result.title: Report on existing standards and standardization landscape
result.description: This deliverable is the result of the activities of Task 71Standarization with the objective of facilitate through standardization the acceptance and utilization by the market of the developed solution The deliverable will present an identification of related applicable standards by identifying the existing standards and the ongoing developments at European and international levels applicable to BRESAER solution It is proposed at the very beginning of the project as it will constitute an important output that could influence the technical definition of the BRESAER system and its components
